Reviews.Title: HB75 bullet camera
Reviews.Author: larry musico
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality. I have it installed in a commercial kitchen & sometimes it does not work. I believe it is sensitive to heat which the ovens generate. I plan on relocating this camera to a cooler position. I believe this was the issue with my original Honeywell camera that stopped working.

ProductInfo.Features: 1/3" CCD High Resolution IR Bullet Camera, 600 TVL, 18 IR LEDs, 3.8-9.5 mm
ProductInfo.Name: Honeywell Video HB75 True Day/Night Bullet Camera (600 TVL, VFAI, IR)
